author: tkormann
msg: fix a bug. adding elements in an empty group now works

author: tkormann
msg: Shift+Reload flushes the image cache first.
Note: it's not the best way to do that (could have removed from the
cache only images of the current document) but in that case we need a
timestamp or something to indicate when the image has been cached (at
the previous load or the current one).
The full solution might be done later.

author: tkormann
msg: ImageTagRegistry does not cache broken links anymore.
There is now a chance when reloading a document that images will be found.
Next step is to add Shift+Reload to force a reload of the cached image for

author: tkormann
msg: remove useless code as it was not the right way to track leaks.

author: tkormann
msg: fix a huge memory leak in the viewer
When closing a window, the document, canvas... will go to GC
